Computes the golden section for combined candidates

Source: R/sdts_train.R
golden.section.2.Rd

Computes the golden section for combined candidates

golden.section.2(dist.pro, thold, label, pos.st, pos.ed, beta, window.size,
  fit.idx)

Arguments

dist.pro

the candidate distance profile
thold

a number with the threshold used to calculate the F-Score
label

a vector with the data bool annotation
pos.st

a vector with the starting points of label
pos.ed

a vector with the ending points of label
beta

a number that balance the F-Score. Beta > 1 towards recall, < towards precision
window.size

an integer with the sliding window size
fit.idx

an integer with the index of the current threshold

Value

Returns the best threshold and its F-Score

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
